Key Match Events: Anthony Edwards scored the go-ahead basket with a floating jump shot that put Minnesota on top 117-116 with 25.7 seconds to go.
Denver played down the stretch without guard Jamal Murray, who left in the third quarter after colliding with Julius Randle.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Timberwolves trailed by 10 points in the fourth quarter before closing the game on a 17-4 run to secure the victory.
Others: The Nuggets stormed to a 25-3 run to grab a 112-102 lead with 4:17 remaining.
Donte DiVincenzo dished a pass to Gobert for a basket to put Minnesota on top 49-33 with 7:18 remaining in the second quarter.
